column1: Silapathar is a city in Dhemaji district in the Indian state of Assam. The city is situated on the northern bank of the Brahmaputra River
column2: and is located 470 kilometres from the city of Guwahati and just 6 km from border of Arunachal Pradesh.The longest rail cum road bridge in India (Bogibeel bridge)connects silapathar to Dibrugarh.Historical Malinithan mandir is located on its subareas.
